testcase.name: AuthProvider > logout: clears context and localStorage
AuthProvider > register: successful registration calls services and updates context
AuthProvider > register: failed registration does not call login or update context and re-throws error
AuthProvider > initial state: not authenticated, not loading (after useEffect finishes)
AuthProvider > loads and validates token and user from localStorage on initial mount
AuthProvider > login: successful login updates context and localStorage
AuthProvider > login: failed login does not update context and logs error
AuthProvider > logout: clears context and localStorage
AuthProvider > register: successful registration calls authService.register, then authService.login, and updates context
AuthProvider > register: failed registration does not call login or update context
LoginPage > loads and validates token and user from localStorage on initial mount
LoginPage > logout: clears context and localStorage
LoginPage > login: successful login updates context and localStorage
RegisterPage Component > renders registration form with all fields and submit button
RegisterPage Component > allows typing into form fields
RegisterPage Component > calls register from AuthContext with form data and navigates on successful submit
RegisterPage Component > displays an error message on failed registration
RegisterPage Component > renders link to login page
RegisterPage Component > password and confirm password validation: mismatch
Header Component > renders brand name "Smart Auto Trader"
Header Component > renders "Vehicles" navigation link
Header Component > when user is not authenticated and not loading > renders "Log In" and "Register" links and does not show profile or logout
Header Component > when user is authenticated and not loading > renders "My Profile" link and "Log Out" button for regular authenticated user
Header Component > when user is authenticated and not loading > calls the logout function from AuthContext when "Log Out" button is clicked
Header Component > when user is authenticated and not loading > profile link navigates to /profile
Header Component > when user is authenticated and not loading > Admin Links > does NOT render "Admin Inquiries" link for regular authenticated user
Header Component > when user is authenticated and not loading > Admin Links > renders "Admin Inquiries" link for authenticated admin user
Header Component > when auth state is loading > renders "Log In" and "Register" links if not authenticated, even when loading
Header Component > when auth state is loading > renders Profile, Logout, and Admin (if applicable) links if authenticated, even when loading
Header Component > when auth state is loading > renders Profile and Logout links but NOT Admin link if authenticated non-admin user, even when loading
VehicleCard Component > renders essential vehicle details
VehicleCard Component > renders primary image with correct alt text and src
VehicleCard Component > handles missing primary image gracefully
VehicleCard Component > handles empty images array gracefully
VehicleCard Component > "View Details" link navigates to the correct vehicle page
VehicleFilters Component > renders filter controls and fetches initial data on mount
VehicleFilters Component > calls onFilterChange when a make is selected
VehicleFilters Component > fetches models when a make is selected
VehicleFilters Component > "Reset All Filters" button calls onFilterChange with specific reset values
